#summary Introducing The Framework
#sidebar TableOfContents

The VAST framework is an actionscript 3.0 implementation of a series of classes that control calls to the OpenX ad server to request and retrieve any number of VAST compliant video ads.

The framework is housed under the package:

     `com.bouncingminds.vast`
